name: FLASH!
description:
Made by:
Ole Marius Andersen (https://twitter.com/SuddenlyJimmy)

Controls: 
1, 2, 3, 4 to change view. Mouse to use flashlight. 

Description:
Keep the art of your gallery valuable! Stop sneaky photographers by flashing them with your light.

Made during Valmuen Game Jam November 2019, where the theme was "Shooting gallery"
